subject: Brake pedal Travel
description_text:
Hello!
I have a Simsson plus x pedals and I would like to know how do I increase the travel of the brake pedal I'm using the red elastomer now and the brake feels stiff and has a very low pedal travel, I have the load cell setup to 26 kg

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi yousifahmed321@outlook. com,       You can remove the 10mm travel limiter spacer inside the black brake spring to increase the pedal travel. This spacer is the default F1-style setup: it shortens the compression travel of the black spring to simulate the ~1–2mm pad-to-disc clearance feel.
